label: Harpsichord
description: Instruction in harpsichord at the undergraduate level. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Passing of a performance audition is required prior to the initial registration in any applied music course.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Passing of a performance audition is required prior to the initial registration in any applied music course.
classScheduleInformation: Open only to students who have passed a qualifying audition. Non-music majors will be assessed a fee.
